title: ColGlen
name: ColGlen
description:
A Map by Glendaruel

Locations in and around Colintraive &amp; Glendaruel

properties.name: ColGlen Shinty Pitch
properties.description: Posted by GlendaruelWhen ColGlen play at home, they play here - a stone\'s throw from the Hotel (the team\'s sponsors) where many post-match pints have been drunk.

properties.name: Colintraive Hotel
properties.description: Posted by Glendaruel Bar, restaurant, rooms, moorings - and views down the Kyles.

properties.name: Colintraive Village Hall
properties.description: Posted by Glendaruel Colintraive\'s Hall boasts an all-weather bowling green and a lovely public garden. Venue for public and provate events.

properties.name: Cruach Mhor Windfarm
properties.description: Posted by GlendaruelA large wind farm. Makes a yearly contribution to the local community as recompense for the impact of the windfarm.

properties.name: Dunans
properties.description: Posted by Glendaruel  Open to visitors with heritage walk. A-listed bridge designed by Thomas Telford. B-listed castle. Ravine-top walk.

properties.name: Fletcher Family Mausoleum
properties.description: Posted by Glendaruel Extraordinary mausoleum for the Fletcher Family. C-listed, the building is one of three listed buildings in the curtilage of Dunans Castle

properties.name: Gates of Lucknow
properties.description: Posted by Glendaruel A slice of Colonial History built to celebrate or commemorate our glorious, or is that peculiar, treatment and relationship with the Indian subcontinent. Once part of the Glendaruel House estate, and latterly the Cripps family.

properties.name: Glendaruel Caravan Park
properties.description: Posted by Glendaruel  Premier caravan park on the West Coast, winner of the 2005 VisitScotland Thistle Award. Run by the Craigs.

properties.name: Glendaruel Hotel
properties.description: Posted by Glendaruel Centre of Clachan life - you\'ll find a great bar, superb food and a wonderful bonhomie (in the form of Clive & Jackie) ... Not to mention recently refurbished rooms.

properties.name: Glendaruel Village Hall
properties.description: Posted by GlendaruelCentral to the Glendaruel Community\'s life, public and private events are often held here, including the glen\'s Ceildh\'s.

properties.name: Kilmoden Standing Stones
properties.description: Posted by GlendaruelIn the churchyard of Kilmoden Church, the standing stones are on permanent display by the River Ruel.

properties.name: Ormidale House
properties.description: Posted by Glendaruel    Historic House set in over 20 acres of grounds. Takes up to 30 people for events, long breaks and weekends.
